Digital Current is a performance-driven search marketing agency focused on driving revenue for our clients through an integrated customer acquisition marketing strategy. We specialize in SEO, PPC, Content Strategy, Conversion Optimization and Link Development.•	Specializing in enterprise level eCommerce and lead conversion optimization. •	Manage tactical execution of organic search strategies, conduct regular site audits, comprehensive and complex keyword research, link building, analytic analysis and portfolio management to identify and drive growth opportunities, reporting of key SEO performance metrics.•	Lead all aspects of Fortune 1000 and enterprise level clients’ digital strategy, planning, execution, optimization, and measurement/reporting for organic search.•	Engage and closely collaborate with client’s web production, Marketing and IT teams to drive initiatives for best user experience, clean site architecture taxonomy & content, impacting rankings of category keywords in organic search results.•	Manage and drive custom SEO reporting construct for each client’s needs, develop and present bi-weekly & monthly updates to demonstrate the impact of company’s investment to senior and executive management teams.

Principle Web and eCommerce Manager overseeing Sage product marketing websites in the Small Business division for all Sage product eStores across US, Canada and French Canadian websites. Responsible for driving online marketing, social media, new lead acquisition, web best practices, thought leadership, web analysis, and eStore cart conversions.•	Develops, executes and delivers the digital / online marketing strategy, social media, planning and budget to include web, e-commerce and SEO to drive business forward through key marketing channels.•	Reviews technologies and explore new developments in the social and digital landscape to find ways of effectively delivering the communication and business objectives.•	Manages customer and partner communities to drive leads and ensure thorough gap analysis, as well as appropriate support to correct performance within cost effective targets.•	Ensures smooth running and completion of projects across site builds, online advertising, social media, maximizing online sales opportunities, search marketing and communities.•	Collaborates with stakeholders to develop online marketing strategies; analyzing Google Analytics and identifying business objectives.•	Plans, implements, and measures PPC, SEM, SEO strategies to maximize customer engagement and ROI.•	Identifies trends and provides fast, accurate reports, optimizing campaigns to produce the best return on investment for the clients.Key Accomplishments:•	Assumed management responsibilities of Canadian accounting software division websites resulting in record sales within 2 months.•	Led web project of time management software line with minimal budget resulting in revenue 133% over established goal.•	Implemented new responsive design websites across multiple product lines and divisions resulting in an increase of generated sales leads.•	Measurable organic traffic increase through SEO optimization of accounting division websites via Google Analytics.

Managed several Sage product and authenticated support websites promoting small to enterprise business management and accounting products to prospects, customers, and partners. • Strategic planning with stakeholders on usability and site effectiveness. Aligned site functionality to marketing objectives and lead gen requirements.• Measured and analyzed web metrics for KPI reports providing website, lead gen and PPC landing page performance data.• Day-to-day management and implementation of website updates and changes.

Authorize, regulate and control Mesa Air Group / America West flights according to government and company regulations to expedite and ensure safety of flight. Point of contact for flight crew in the event of an emergency. Proactively flight followed aircraft under my supervision to ensure a safe and event free flight. Dispatched all MAG/AW Fleet types.•	Licensed airman with ATP and ETOPS certificate ratings certified by the Federal Aviation Administration.•	Authorized, regulated and controlled commercial airline flights according to government and company regulations to expedite and ensure safety of flight.•	Analyzed and evaluated meteorological information to determine potential hazards to safety of flight and designated the most logistical and safest route of flight.•	 Prepared flight plans containing information including maximum allowable take-off and landing weights, fuel loads, weight & balance load distribution, weather reports, field conditions, NOTAMS and other informational components required for the safe completion of the flight.

Having worked for many years across multiple product lines at Sage with Shari as my project manager, she always kept all members of the team as well as management informed of the progress through every phase or our web development projects. Shari always showed an uncanny ability to foresee a potential problem and kept our projects on schedule, saving the company money and preventing unexpected hurdles from delaying the project’s ultimate implementation. Always an effective delegator of task, Shari trusted our team members with assignments. Shari constantly proved to be a fair and effective leader of all our projects, and I miss working with her as ive moved on to another company.

summary: Accomplished, results-driven Digital Web and eCommerce Marketing Professional with more than 17 years’ experience in a broad range of SEO strategy, web management, social media, partner and customer community channels, marketing, and creative development. Proven expertise in planning and implementing enterprise level online web strategies, directing cross-functional creative, technical and marketing teams, and managing major web initiatives and social media presence. • Proven track record of developing, managing and optimizing complex CMS websites, as well as having created and managed effective and integrated Social Media campaigns, delivering successful SEO consultancies. • Achieve a strong, visible social media presence and develop concepts with viral potential. Continuously monitor online public relations and ensure the success of client and partner community programs.• Develops, maintains, and utilizes knowledge of web industry standards and trends, competitive environment, and editorial vision. Demonstrates thorough evolution of web development and usability as necessary.• Web site design, implementation, wire-frame architecture, policies, procedures, budgets, and strategic planning. Numerous accolades for superior performance and teamwork.• Proactive and strategic adviser to business unit stakeholders to help identify and implement online marketing strategies and tactics for websites, email campaigns, newsletters, and Google Analytics.• Organizes and oversees the digital editorial work-flow, quality control, and promotion processes for assigned products, micro-sites, and other special projects. Establishes and reinforces measurable goals.• Responsible for accuracy, clarity, completeness, appropriateness for intended audience, and conformity to established standard format guidelines of web sites. Acts as liaison between editorial, marketing production, art, sales, and other support department staffs.
